About

I'm Rob Safar and situationi.st is my home. I'm based in London, UK and do Internet things as a Digital Producer.

After growing somewhat despondent with the usual WordPress, Blogger and Tumblr setups, I’ve decided to go for a Jekyll site, hosted for free on GitHub Pages, using the Poole theme as a base. It’s much better suited for my purposes, it’s lighter than most alternatives and allows for a lot more freedom in connecting together my other projects.

I also drew upon this blog post by Joshua Lande for a little guidance and inspiration.

You can see the code for this entire site in its public repository.

Rob Safar
